column2:
Just a friendly reminder, be sure to get your exercise in!

Avoid foods with high carbs

Fruits are rich with antioxidants and are very healthy!

Tofu is rich in protein and fiber

AVOID ENERGY DRINKS AT ALL COSTS!

Smoking is a very hazardous activity

Type 2 diabetes accounts for 90% - 95% of all cases of diagnosed diabetes

Diabetes is a significant risk factor for heart disease
